Rulings.Base: 1. This effect can activate during the Damage Step.\n2. If "Wattfox" is being treated as an Equip Spell that you control and it is destroyed, its effect will activate.\n3. If your opponent controls your "Wattfox" its effect will not activate when it is destroyed by either player's card.
